project_path.meteor: contracts/HyperMeteor Full Smart Contract Security Audit/meteor

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: Functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` may abort with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.
findings.location: Functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` in the meteor contract
